meanings.definition: The science or art of flight through the air.
meanings.sent1: Studying aeronautics helps us understand how things fly in the sky.
meanings.sent2: Aeronautics has led to incredible advancements in aviation technology.
meanings.sent3: The professor's passion for aeronautics made even the dullest students pay attention.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams soared high, fueled by her love for aeronautics.
meanings.sent5: The museum exhibit on aeronautics was both educational and awe-inspiring.

meanings.definition: The design, construction, and operation of aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Aeronautics involves creating and testing new airplane models.
meanings.sent2: The field of aeronautics requires a deep understanding of aerodynamics.
meanings.sent3: The aeronautics team celebrated the successful test flight with a party.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a playground of ideas, all revolving around aeronautics.
meanings.sent5: The aeronautics engineer meticulously checked every detail before the plane took off.
